description:
This time in the #KinoCheckNews "Top Gun 3", “Spider-Man 4: Brand New Day”, “Harry Potter” etc.| App ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App | Best Movie News Show | All News https://KinoCheck.com/news

00:00 Top Gun 3: Update on the new Tom Cruise Movie
After "Mission: Impossible 8" comes "Top Gun 3": while Tom Cruise is currently starring in what may be the final installment of the spy franchise, a new "Top Gun" movie is also on the horizon. Screenwriter Christopher McQuarrie recently offered an update on the sequel during the Happy Sad Confused podcast.

01:20 Harry Potter: Actors for Harry, Ron and Hermione Have Been Found!
Finally: HBO has officially announced the main cast of the upcoming "Harry Potter" series. This will be a faithful adaptation of the seven books by J.K. Rowling. As expected, the iconic roles will be played by three young talents.

02:25 Hulk in Spider-Man 4: Brand New Day
Good news for all Marvel fans: as Nexus Point News exclusively reports, Mark Ruffalo will make an app
title: Tom Cruise in Top Gun 3, Hulk in Spider-Man 4, Harry Potter Cast, Dragonlord... KinoCheck News

Hundreds of people whose lives are not going so well and who urgently need money are invited to take part in a mysterious game - a prize of the equivalent of 33 million euros beckons. Locked together, the participants are confronted with children's games from the 70s and 80s that are popular in Korea. But this time it's a matter of life and death - and only one can win in the end and keep his life.

Squid Game (2025) is the new drama series starring Lee Jung-jae, Wi Ha-jun and Park Hae-soo.
